newsitem.title: USA: Los Angeles-area voters OK $327 mln school bonds.
newsitem.headline: Los Angeles-area voters OK $327 mln school bonds.

text.p: Voters in the Los Angeles County-area approved over $327 million of school bonds in Tuesday's special election, school officials said.
* Glendale Unified School District's $186 million bond measure.
* ABC Unified School District's $59 million bond measure.
* Monrovia Unified School District's $34 million bond measure.
* Hawthorne School District's $28 million bond measure.
* East Whittier City School District's $20 million bond measure.
* Torrance Unified School District's $80.5 million bond measure.
* Pomona Unified School District's $35 million bond measure.
* El Segundo Unified School's $24 million bond measure.
